prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
KALYAN GODUGUNURU
Contact: +91-9381792652
Email-Id: kgodugunuru2023@gmail.com
EXPERIENCE SUMMARY:
4.0  years of experience in Analysing, Designing, Developing, Documenting, Testing, and Deploying Web, Windows, and Console applications with extensive experience in Microsoft Visual Studio environment using C#, ASP.NET MVC, ADO.NET, LINQUE,SQL SERVER,WEBAPI
I have knowledge latest .Net Framework (4.8/ CORE 3.0/3.1) with N - tier Architecture model and design patterns.
2.0  years of experience in Angular 10,12,13, 15,HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, and Typescript.
Experience in building Single Page Applications (SPA) using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, AngularJS, ASP.NET MVC, Bootstrap, ASP.NET  and Entity Framework.
Good Experience in configuring and managing IIS 6.0/7.0- WEB Server.
Worked with Team Foundation Server, SVN, Git, GitLab.
Proficient in Data Analysis, Design, and Data Modelling, using LINQ (LINQ to SQL, LINQ to XML), Entity Framework, ADO.NET, and T-SQL in developing Data Access Layer, writing SQL Queries, Stored Procedures, and User-Defined Functions. Good experience in SQL Server 2012/2014 and MySQL
Excellent programming skills and strong in Object-Oriented programming (OOP) concepts.
Experienced in SQL for writing Indexes, and Views, Stored Procedures, Cursors, Triggers under defined function DTS, Transaction management, T-SOL, code optimization, and performance Tuning creating tables and Indexes.
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 	
Worked with CompuGain Solutions Pvt. Ltd, Hyderabad as Software Engineer from  July 2021 to  April 21 2024.
Worked with Bar Code India Ltd, Bangalore as Software Engineer from  July 2024 to till now.
TECHNICAL SKILLS SET
Web Technologies		:	MVC 4.0/5.0, .NET 4.0/4.5, ASP.NET
Frameworks		:	.Net Framework 
Languages			:	C#
Scripting Languages	: 	              Angular 2/4/6/7/15 , JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax
Cloud			:	Microsoft Azure
Markup Languages	:	              HTML 4.0/5.0
Style Sheet		             :	              CSS/CSS 3
Design Framew
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
